content:
Between: each user member of only 1 condition. Use for user experience. Closer to real world usage situation. No unwanted carry over effects.
Half a half b: Realistic interaction. Manipulation hidden. Many participants needed.
Within:User experience multiple conditions. Use for psychological research. effects typically smaller. Nice to control between-subjects variability.
A first then B: Remove subject variability. Part may see thru manip.Spill-over effect
A and B same time: Remove subject variability. Participants can compare condition. Not real interacti.FIELD STUDY: 1) can be more quantitative 2) More subjects so can be more generalizable 3)Less in depth 4)less supervised
